quotes: In 2010, the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs launched the UAE Vision 2021 and the UAE Strategy Cycle 2011-2013
the Ministry of Cabinet Affairs launched the UAE Vision 2021 and the UAE Strategy Cycle 2011-2013
In 2013, the UAE government launched the Government Summit, later to become the World Government Summit
Al Gergawi was appointed Managing Director of the Dubai Future Foundation in 2015
In 2016, Al Gergawi was mandated to set up the Dubai Future Accelerators
In July 2018, he was named to a 20-person United Nations advisory panel on digital technology
Between April 2018 to July 2020, he led, under the directives of the leadership, the government development and modernization portfolio
Since February 2020, he has holds the position of Deputy Chairman of the 50-year Development Plan Committee
